Equation

The well known Pythagorean theorem: \(x^2 + y^2 = z^2\) was proved to be invalid for other exponents. Meaning the next equation has no integer solutions: \[[ x^n + y^n = z^n ]\] (Rahm, Do, et al. 2000)
